component.name: bulletty
component.summary: A pretty TUI feed reader for RSS and Atom feeds

description.p: bulletty is a terminal-based feed reader that supports both RSS and Atom feeds. It stores articles locally as Markdown files, allowing you to read them offline and keep a permanent archive of your favorite content.

ul.li: Beautiful TUI interface with customizable themes
Support for both RSS and Atom feeds
Articles stored locally as Markdown files
Fuzzy search across feeds and articles

screenshot.caption: bulletty main interface showing feed list and article preview

description.p: This is the first official release of bulletty in 2026!
